title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for January 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for January 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis. The episodes from January 6 to January 10, 2025 will celebrate the 50th Anniversary of Wheel of Fortune, meaning that a few of the puzzles will likely be themed around the game show in some of the way. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three pairs of contestants: Jennifer Hawkins, Jason Blackwell, and Amber Holland. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 8. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, January 8, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – GOOFING OFF [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – INVESTING IN THE FUTURE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #2 – SPARKLING WINE [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #1 – CLAPPING, CHEERING & CUTTING CAKE [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – HAWAII THE ALOHA STATE [On The Map] Regular Puzzle #3 – EXHILARATING ACTIVITIES [Fun & Games] Tossup #3 – SPOTLIGHT [Thing] Tossup #4 – BRIGHT SPOT [Thing] Tossup #5 – BALD SPOT [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – SHEER LACE CURTAINS [Around the House] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Tuesday, January 7: Bonus Round Puzzle – FINAL OFFER [Thing] Tossup #1 – MAJOR ACCOMPLISHMENT [Thing] Tossup #2 – WINNING A BUNCH OF CASH [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #1 – SOLVING PUZZLES IN SPACES [The Next 50 Years] Regular Puzzle #2 – CELEBRATE GOOD TIMES, COME ONE! [Song Lyrics] Regular Puzzle #3 – SUNBATHING SEA LIONS [Living Things] Tossup #3 – LEMONADE STAND [Place] Tossup #4 – CONCESSION STAND [Place] Tossup #5 – WITNESS STAND [Place] Regular Puzzle #4 – CREATING MY OWN DESTINY [What Are You Doing?] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 10 episode. Wheel of Fortune also has several contests this month, including the ability to win a trip to Puerto Rico on Instagram and a Holland America cruise giveaway for a 7-day trip for two for a contest that runs from January 13 to 17. Watchers can also win $10,000 by entering the My$tery Wedge contest and entering with their SPIN ID.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis.

The episodes from January 6 to January 10, 2025 will celebrate the 50th Anniversary of Wheel of Fortune, meaning that a few of the puzzles will likely be themed around the game show in some of the way. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three pairs of contestants: Jennifer Hawkins, Jason Blackwell, and Amber Holland. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 8.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, January 8, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – GOOFING OFF [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – INVESTING IN THE FUTURE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #2 – SPARKLING WINE [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CLAPPING, CHEERING & CUTTING CAKE [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – HAWAII THE ALOHA STATE [On The Map]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – EXHILARATING ACTIVITIES [Fun & Games]
  • Tossup #3 – SPOTLIGHT [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – BRIGHT SPOT [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – BALD SPOT [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – SHEER LACE CURTAINS [Around the House]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Tuesday, January 7:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – FINAL OFFER [Thing]
  • Tossup #1 – MAJOR ACCOMPLISHMENT [Thing]
  • Tossup #2 – WINNING A BUNCH OF CASH [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SOLVING PUZZLES IN SPACES [The Next 50 Years]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – CELEBRATE GOOD TIMES, COME ONE! [Song Lyrics]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SUNBATHING SEA LIONS [Living Things]
  • Tossup #3 – LEMONADE STAND [Place]
  • Tossup #4 – CONCESSION STAND [Place]
  • Tossup #5 – WITNESS STAND [Place]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – CREATING MY OWN DESTINY [What Are You Doing?]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 10 episode.

Wheel of Fortune also has several contests this month, including the ability to win a trip to Puerto Rico on Instagram and a Holland America cruise giveaway for a 7-day trip for two for a contest that runs from January 13 to 17. Watchers can also win $10,000 by entering the My$tery Wedge contest and entering with their SPIN ID.
